|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [disposed](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.disposed.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Whether this comment has been disposed or not. |
|  [disposing](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.disposing.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Whether this comment is being disposed or not. |

|  [isMovable()](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.ismovable.md) |  | Returns whether the comment is movable or not, respecting whether the workspace is read-only. |
|  [isOwnDeletable()](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.isowndeletable.md) |  | Returns whether the comment is deletable or not, only examining its own state and ignoring the state of the workspace. |
|  [isOwnEditable()](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.isowneditable.md) |  | Returns whether the comment is editable or not, only examining its own state and ignoring the state of the workspace. |
|  [isOwnMovable()](./blockly.comments.workspacecomment.isownmovable.md) |  | Returns whether the comment is movable or not, only examining its own state and ignoring the state of the workspace. |
